syntax.uno: public static bool ExtendCapture(object identity, int pointIndex) {}

comment.brief: Adds more points to an existing capture. All the points will be captured in the same fashion as the original capture (such as Hard or Soft).
comment.full: Adds more points to an existing capture. All the points will be captured in the same fashion as the original capture (such as Hard or Soft).

returns.text: `false` if this is not allowed based on other captures (existing hard capture for example). In this case the original capture will be left unchanged. `true` if the capture now watches this new point in addition to any previous points.
